title: Graviditet Befruktning Kalkylator
metaDescription: Gratis pregnancy conception calculator - Estimate your conception date, fertility window, and due date baserat på your last menstrual period or due date.

form.title: Ange Din Information
form.lmpDateHelp: Ange the first day of your last menstrual period
form.cycleLengthHelp: The average length of your menstrual cycle (default: 28 days)

info.title: Om Graviditet Befruktning
info.description: The pregnancy conception calculator helps you estimate when conception likely occurred baserat på your last menstrual period or your due date. This information can be helpful for determining paternity or simply for better understanding your pregnancy.
info.howItWorks: Befruktning typically occurs around ovulation, which is usually 14 days before the start of your next period. For a 28-day cycle, this means ovulation occurs around day 14. Sperm can survive for up to 5 days in the body, so the fertility window includes the 5 days before ovulation plus the day of ovulation. Graviditet lasts approximately 280 days (40 weeks) from the first day of your last menstrual period.
info.accuracy: This calculator provides estimates baserat på average menstrual cycles. Actual ovulation and conception can vary from person to person. Factors that may affect accuracy include irregular menstrual cycles, late or early ovulation, and individual variations. For more precise information about your pregnancy, consult with your healthcare provider.
info.disclaimer: Note: This calculator is for informational purposes only and should not be used as medical advice. Always consult with a healthcare professional for accurate medical information about your pregnancy.
